item.title: Penalized power approach to compare the power of the tests when Type I error probabilities are different
item.description: Reference Mustafa Cavus, Berna Yazici, Ahmet Sezer “Penalized power approach to compare the power of the tests when Type I error probabilities are different” (2021) // Communications in Statistics - Simulation and Computation. Vol. 50. No 7. Pp. 1912–1926.
